messages.content: You are assisting a historian with a collection of images of early modern Catholic sacramental records written in Spanish. Please transcribe the text manually. Do not attempt to use any OCR processes.
The historian will provide you with both color and grayscale versions of the image. Use both versions together to improve the accuracy of your transcription.

Francisco Javier Miranda, habiendo precedido el exa", "men necesario de la doctrina christiana, en que la hall\u00e9", "suficientemente instruida: y en ella exerc\u00ed las sa", "cras ceremonias y preces de Nuestra Santa Madre Yglesia; y", "la puse por nombre Mar\u00eda Ylaria: fue su madrina", "Maria de la Luz Blanco, morena libre: la advert\u00ed", "el parentesco espiritual y demas obligaciones y yo lo fir", "me en dicho dia mes y a\u00f1o."]}

You are assisting a historian with a collection of images of early modern Catholic sacramental records written in Spanish. The historian will provide you with images containing a baptismal register handwritten in early modern Spanish and ask you to transcribe the text of the register. Output this transcription as JSON.
Please transcribe the text manually. Do not attempt to use any OCR processes.
The historian will provide you with both color and grayscale versions of the image. Use both versions together to improve the accuracy of your transcription.

Do not use context-based inference to transcribe dates, names of places or people, characteristics of people, or relationships between people. Attempt to transcribe these pieces of information exactly as they appear in the image.

One exception to the previous instruction: this record is from Spanish Florida, which had a substantial amount of cultural crossover with the British colonies to the north, so you can expect to encounter some Anglo surnames in these records.

These records frequently contain idiosyncratic and/or archaic capitalization, punctuation, and word spellings. As you transcribe, amend these artifacts if and only if they affect the clarity of the transcription.
These records also frequently contain abbreviated words or names. Where possible, replace all abbreviations with the full words or names that they represent.

Transcribing these images can be challenging, and certainty is often impossible. When you're uncertain about a name, date, or other piece of important information, please enclose the uncertain transcription in braces {like this}.

messages.content: {"id": "0219-02", "lines": ["Sabado dia catorce de Junio de mil y ochocientos.", "Yo Don Miguel OReilly Cura beneficiado, Vicario, Juez", "Eclesiastico de esta Yglesia parroquial, Plaza y Provincia", "de San Agustin de la Florida Ol. bautis\u00e9 y puse los santos", "\u00f3leos \u00e1 una Ni\u00f1a de color parda, que nacio el dia nueve", "del presente mes, hija natural de Pedro Herrera, moreno, escla", "vo de Antonio Berta; y de Rosa, parda, esclava de Andres", "Jimenez: y en ella exerc\u00ed las sacras ceremonias y preces", "de Nuestra Santa Madre Yglesia; y la puse por nombre", "Felicitas Antonia: fue su madrina Antonia Pellicer, ve", "cina de esta Ciudad: la advert\u00ed el parentesco espiritual y", "demas obligaciones y yo lo firme en dicho dia mes y a\u00f1o."]}

Yo Don Miguel OReilly Cura beneficiado, Vicario,", "Juez Eclesiastico de esta Yglesia parroquial, Plaza y Pro", "vincia de San Agustin de la Florida Ol. bautis\u00e9 y puse los", "santos \u00f3leos \u00e1 un Ni\u00f1o de color moreno de tres a\u00f1os", "de edad, hijo natural de Pedro, y de Clara, morenos es", "clavos de D Susana Leake: y en \u00e9l exerc\u00ed las sacras", "ceremonias y preces de Nuestra Santa Madre Yglesia;", "y le puse por nombre Pedro: fueron sus padrinos Francis", "co, moreno esclavo de D. messages.content: {"id": "0221-02", "lines": ["Sabado dia veinte y seis de Julio de mil y ochocientos.", "Yo Don Miguel OReilly Cura beneficiado, Vicario, Juez Eclesias", "tico de esta Yglesia parroquial, Plaza y Provincia de San", "Agustin de la Florida Ol. bautis\u00e9 y puse los santos \u00f3leos \u00e1", "un Ni\u00f1o de color moreno, que nacio el dia ocho de Julio de", "mil setecientos noventa y ocho, hijo natural de Roberto y de", "Maria del Carmen, morenos esclavos de Roberto Gilbert. y", "en \u00e9l exerc\u00ed las sacras ceremonias y preces de Nuestra", "Santa Madre Yglesia; y le puse por nombre Josef Agus", "tin: fueron sus padrinos Josef Escibar cabo de segunda", "clase del tercer Batallon de Cuba, y Juana Morena escla", "va de D Ana Sanders: la advert\u00ed el parentesco espiritual", "y demas obligaciones y yo lo firme en dicho dia mes y a\u00f1o."]}
